PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MaintenanceTriggerPerformance
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties for performance based maintenance policies

PropertyDef.Name: TargetPerformance
PropertyDef.Definition: Target capacity or performance of the asset. Units of the performance value are specified through the propertyValue units attribute.

PropertyDef.Name: PerformanceMaintenanceLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Performance level at which maintenance takes place

PropertyDef.Name: ReplacementLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Performance level at which replacement takes place

PropertyDef.Name: DisposalLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Performance level at which disposal takes place
